snippet: Sister Jacqueline Walsh of the Sisters of Mercy was found lying next to Rose Hill Road in Water Mill, N.Y., around 8:30 p.m. Monday.
abstract: Police are searching for the driver of a vehicle that killed Sister Jacqueline Walsh of the Sisters of Mercy in a hit-and-run accident in town of Water Mill on Long Island, where she was on a religious retreat with colleagues from her order.
lead_paragraph: Sister Jacqueline Walsh of the Sisters of Mercy was found lying next to Rose Hill Road in Water Mill, N.Y., around 8:30 p.m. Monday.

headline.seo: After Nun’s Death, Long Island Police Search for a Hit-and-Run Driver
headline.main: Hit-and-Run Driver Sought in Nun’s Death
headline.print_headline: Hit-and-Run Driver Sought in Nun’s Death
